definition: showing little if any change, a farm building for housing horses or other livestock, shelter in a stable
details:
adjective
- showing little if any change
= synonyms: static
- maintaining equilibrium
- not taking part readily in chemical change
- firm and dependable
- resistant to change of position or condition
= example: resistant to change of position or condition
noun
- a farm building for housing horses or other livestock
= synonyms: stalls, horse barn
verb
- shelter in a stable
= example: shelter in a stable
